article.title: SRCTec to Provide Counter Mortar Radars
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: SRCTec Inc., Syracuse, N.Y., was awarded a firm-fixed-price, cost-plus-fixed-fee, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract with a maximum value of $221,800,000 for the procurement of lightweight counter mortar radars and related parts and services. The Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Md., is the contracting activity (W15P7T-13-D-C702).
